Title: Swan Lake 3D - Live from the Mariinsky Theatre
Writer: Vladimir Begichev (libretto), Vasily Geltzer (libretto), Marius Petipa (choreography), Lev Ivanov (choreography), Konstantin Sergeyev (revised choreography), Ann McGuire (275 years special Event screenplay construction)
Actors: Mariinsky Ballet, Valery Gergiev, The Orchestra of the Mariinsky Theatre, Ekaterina Kondaurova
Plot: A spectacular special event edition of Swan Lake in 3D starring Ekaterina Kondaurova and Natalia Vodianova - model, actress and story-teller was recorded and broadcast live from the ...
